title: Chicken Chilli
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '4 cooked chicken breasts or leftover roast chicken, chopped', '1.5L (2 1/2 pints) chicken stock', '2 to 3 green chillies, seeded and finely chopped', '1 dessertspoon ground cumin', '1 dessertspoon dried oregano', '1 1/2 teaspoons cayenne pepper', '5 (400g) tins cannellini beans, undrained', '100g (4 oz) Cheddar cheese, grated']
